ing.item: Evaporated milk; add more if needed

directions.step: Directions : pour asparagus with juice into a pie plate, add crushed crackers and 1/2 cup of evaporated milk. cook at 350 degrees for 30 min. stir twice during the 30 min. then place cheese slices on top and put back into oven until cheese melts Posted to recipelu-digest Volume 01 Number 460 by Bunny <layla696@ix.netcom.com> on Jan 6, 1998
